sn51.23:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four bases of psychic power.
sn51.23:4.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to enthusiasm … energy …
sn51.23:4.6: These are the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.23:4.7: By developing and cultivating these four bases of psychic power, a mendicant realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having achieved it with their own insight due to the end of defilements.”
